Html: I wrote a couple of programs for the emulator and then closed it. When I opened the program again, much to my displeasure, they were gone and none of the settings I'd selected, like the autosave feature, were still selected. How do I get the emulator to actually save things and respond to the built in autosave commands? I would love to save some programs I have written to the emulator and it is frustrating to have to rewrite them each time I open it. Any ideas?
